description:
Dot is lost in space!  Without gravity, it is hard for Dot to know which way to go.  
Help Dot figure out which way is up, down, and all around.

puzzles.description: Make Dot say "Up" when tilted face up. Then make Dot automatically return to Start.

hints.description: Drag out a curious sound. Set the sound to "Up." Link Start to the sound using a Face Up cue. Link the sound back to Start using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: Make Dot say "Left" when tilted to lean left. Then make Dot automatically return to Start.

hints.description: Drag out a curious sound. Set the sound to "Left." Link Start to the sound using a Lean Left cue. Link the sound back to Start using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: Make Dot say "Right" when tilted to lean right. Then make Dot automatically return to Start.

hints.description: Drag out a curious sound. Set the sound to "Right." Link Start to the sound using a Lean Right cue. Link the sound back to Start using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: Make Dot say "Down" when tilted face down. Then make Dot automatically return to Start.

hints.description: Drag out a curious sound. Set the sound to "Down." Link Start to the sound using a Face Down cue. Link the sound back to Start using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: Make Dot say "Upside down, you can turn me!" when tilted upside down. Then make Dot automatically return to Start.

hints.description: Link Start to the "Upside down, you can turn me!" sound using an Upside Down cue. Link the sound back to Start using an Auto cue.

puzzles.description: PLAY WITH DOT: Help Dot get a good sense of direction in zero gravity. Tilt Dot in each direction.
